thread.title: Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares hilarious texts from her dad teasing her about her love life
thread.title_full: Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares hilarious texts from her dad teasing her about her love life

title: Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares hilarious texts from her dad teasing her about her love life
text:
Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares hilarious texts from her dad teasing her about her love life Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares hilarious texts from her dad teasing her about her love life 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Alec Baldwin’s daughter Ireland can’t hide anything from her famous dad – and rumours about her love life have led to a highly amusing text conversation between the pair. 
Ireland had to put up with the fatherly teasing after an article speculated she was dating Olivia Wilde’s ex-husband. 
The 57-year-old actor had sent her a link to a story which showed pictures of her hanging out with 39-year-old Tao Ruspoli. 
“This is what happens when you get coffee with friends. You get coffee and then you get pregnant and then it spirals out of control from there…” she wrote, sharing a screenshot of their conversation on Instagram. 
The 19-year-old model responded to Alec’s questions about whether she was going to get married and have a baby with “Oh my god I just met him yesterday” and “No, dad Jesus”. Ireland and Alec Baldwin (Evan Agostini/AP) 
But she clearly inherited her father’s sense of humour, informing him it would have to have been a “very immaculate coffee conception”. Share article 
It seems even Hollywood superstars can be plain old embarrassing dads… Promoted Stories
